out_ports.name: other_contours
out_ports.hint:
All other contours in source array: before the range and after the range.
Actually this port is the result of REMOVING the specified range from the source contours array.

controls.name: firstIndex
controls.caption: First index of contour
controls.description: First index of contour; can be 0..N-1, where N = number of contours.

controls.name: numberOfContours
controls.caption: Number of contours to extract
controls.description:
Number of copied contours; can be 0..N-1, where N = number of source contours.
0 values is special and means "copy until the last contour": the actual number of result contours will be Nâˆ’K, where K = first index of contour above.
